Hero.badge: 10 AI Modules · Satellite Data · Orbital Analytics
Hero.description: OrbitAI is an AI platform for monetizing satellite data. We evaluate images, optimize orbits, and generate engineering specs before mission launch.

Features.title: What the platform can do
Features.subtitle: Select any module to see what it does

dataHub.title: Data Hub
dataHub.description: Every 24 hours, the platform automatically crawls open catalogs of NASA, ESA, and Celestrak, downloads millions of records about satellites and Earth imagery, and stores them in a unified spatial database. You just draw a box on the map — the system instantly finds all scenes for any period.

missionDesigner.title: Mission Designer
missionDesigner.description: Write in plain text: "I want to monitor wheat crop yields in Kazakhstan once a week." The system translates this into ready-made technical specifications: orbit type, capture angle, sensor mode, and optimal revisit time.

captureValuePredictor.title: Capture Value Predictor
captureValuePredictor.description: Provide coordinates and capture date. AI accounts for cloud coverage forecasts, terrain type, seasonal demand, and market prices — and tells you how many dollars this image can be sold for on the data exchange. Before launching the satellite.

reportGenerator.title: Report Generator
reportGenerator.description: Click one button — in a minute you download a professional PDF with a zone map, risk charts, an AI text summary, and diagrams that explain exactly why the system made this decision (XAI).

launchDelayPredictor.title: Launch Delay Predictor
launchDelayPredictor.tagline: Know about a delay 72 hours early
launchDelayPredictor.description: The system monitors all scheduled launches, checks spaceport weather, and historic rocket statistics. A red bar warns of the probability of a delay with explained reasons — before any official announcement.

orbitOptimizer.title: Orbit Optimizer
orbitOptimizer.description: Specify current and target orbit. The system calculates the most economical maneuver route (Hohmann transfer), tells you how many kg of fuel will burn, and translates it into dollars. An interactive 3D globe shows the trajectory.

orbitSuitabilityScorer.title: Orbit Suitability Scorer
orbitSuitabilityScorer.tagline: Is this orbit good for your business?
orbitSuitabilityScorer.description: Enter proposed orbit parameters and business objectives. The system scores criteria: area coverage, signal latency, revisit rate. A spider-web chart shows the orbital strengths and weaknesses.

failureForensics.title: Failure Forensics
failureForensics.description: Upload a telemetry CSV — the system analyzes thousands of rows in seconds and highlights anomalous milliseconds in red. Adjacent is a text summary: exactly what happened and which node failed.

scenarioSimulator.title: Scenario Simulator
scenarioSimulator.description: Enter budget, launch cost, and target region. The simulator runs 10,000 virtual satellite lifespans across varying weather and market conditions in seconds. A probability cone shows median profit and true downside risk.

esgAssessor.title: ESG Assessor
esgAssessor.description: Enter rocket and orbit parameters — the system calculates carbon footprint, space debris risk, and assigns an ESG rating from A+ to F. AI suggests concrete engineering changes to improve investor ratings.

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.subtitle: From raw satellite data to investment decisions in seconds.

data.title: Data
data.subtitle: Data Hub
data.description: Automatically gathers satellite scenes, TLEs, and weather from open catalogs (Sentinel, Landsat, Celestrak) indexing into PostGIS.

ai.title: AI Analysis
ai.subtitle: ML Models
ai.description: Trained ML algorithms (LightGBM, CatBoost) and physical models evaluate image value, predict delays, and optimize transfers.

insights.title: Insights
insights.subtitle: Reports & Scores
insights.description: Systems generate clear business metrics: 0 to 100 scores, ROI forecasts with confidence intervals, and explainable AI (XAI) PDF reports.

profit.title: Profit
profit.subtitle: Business Value
profit.description: Investors make informed decisions: whether to buy a scene, where to launch, and how to avoid delays — driven by facts, not intuition.

Cta.description: Launch the platform today. Your first Capture Value Predictor runs are free. No credit card required.

Footer.tagline: Turning satellite data into business decisions with AI.

login.subtitle: Log in to your OrbitAI dashboard

register.description: OrbitAI is a private B2B platform for satellite data operations. Self-registration is temporarily closed.

map.drawHint: Draw a rectangle on the map
map.idleHint: Use the tool on the left to select an area

dataHub.title: Satellite Imagery Hub
dataHub.subtitle: Discover available captures for your selected area
dataHub.emptyDesc: Please draw a bounding box (BBox) on the Interactive Map to search for satellite imagery in this region.

missionDesigner.title: AI Mission Designer
missionDesigner.subtitle: Describe your business problem in plain English. Our AI will translate it into a precise technical aerospace specification.
missionDesigner.placeholder: E.g., I want to count cars in Walmart parking lots in sunny states...
